attributes.action:
STAY SEATED FOR YOUR RIGHTS
End the war on disabled benefits
attributes.additional_details: Should Society accept that those among us to go without in our name! PIP does what it says personal independence and who are we to allow our politicians to forget about those they claimed to defend when the media attention was on them But are now happy to look the other way! When we see a disabled person down the highstreet remember they are having a good day everyone deserves a good day lets be honest we don't notice the bad days they suffer those alone DO SOMETHING WONDERFUL TODAY SIGN HERE
attributes.background: The government tried to bring in universal cuts to personal independence payment at the budget but failed under the gaze of attention but is now being done off grid by the DWP Assessment system claimants face reduced entitlements by simply making it harder to qualify in the appropriate category
